metadata.name: Dance
metadata.description:
Dance, 2021, Hyunseo Cho(Haeum), video, 15 seconds, 1080 x 1920 px

A short video of shimmering people dancing to the beat glamorously. They look simply happy yet grotesque at times. This video is inspired by dance videos on “TikTok”. It illustrates the dances of the modern era, homaging ‘Dance’ by Henri Matisse.
